::KitKat::

She noticed that Drillbit had sounded very glad about the fact that 
she was still functional.  She looked at him and saw a lovesick puppy 
in those eyes of his. She remembered the advice a friend once gave 
her, beware of puppy love for it can lead to a dog's life. She layed 
down and rested her one leg.  She looked back at Stingtra, "Well 
Solo, can you help me?"
